SELECT nts.id, nts.code, nts.name, nts.description, ntemail.code AS email_template_code, ntsms.code AS sms_template_code, ntpm.code AS pm_template_code FROM notify_send_setting nts LEFT JOIN notify_template ntemail on nts.email_template_id = ntemail.id LEFT JOIN notify_template ntsms on nts.email_template_id = ntsms.id LEFT JOIN notify_template ntpm on nts.email_template_id = ntpm.id WHERE level = #{level}
AND nts.code LIKE concat('%',#{code},'%')
AND nts.name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND nts.business_type LIKE concat('%',#{description},'%')
AND( nts.code LIKE concat('%',#{params},'%') OR nts.name LIKE concat('%',#{params},'%') OR nts.description LIKE concat('%',#{params},'%') )
